title: Electric Vehicles (number)
description: Number of registered plug in electric vehicles (pure and hybrid)

title: Electric Buses (number)
description: Number of registered plug in electric Buses (pure and hybrid)

title: Electric HGVs (number)
description: Number of registered plug in electric HGVs (pure and hybrid)

title: Heat Pumps (number)
description: Number of heat pumps per residential household and commercial properties including hybrids

title: Domestic photovoltaic installed capacity (MW)
description: Capacity of solar PV panels on domestic roofs for installations less than 4kW

title: Large solar generation installed capacity (MW)
description: Installed capacity of industrial and commercial solar farms

title: Wind generation installed capacity (MW)
description: Installed capacity of industrial and commercial onshore and offshore wind farms

title: Renewable generation installed capacity (MW)
description: Installed capacity of all renewable generation including solar PV, wind, biomass, renewable gas engines, hydro

title: Non-renewable generation installed capacity (MW)
description: Installed capacity of all non-renewable generation including CHP, waste incineration, non-renewable engines, other thermal

title: Energy storage installed capacity (MW)
description: Installed capacity of domestic, industrial and commercial batteries

title: Domestic underlying energy consumption (MWh)
description: Annual energy consumption by residential households excluding electric vehicle and heat pump consumption

title: Industrial and commercial underlying energy consumption (MWh)
description: Annual energy consumption by industrial and commercial properties excluding electric vehicles and heat pump consumption

title: Total energy consumption including electric vehicles and heat pumps (MWh)
description: Total energy consumption by domestic households and industrial and commercial properties including electric vehicle and heat pump consumption

title: Peak demand (MW) at Primary Substations
description: Peak half hourly demand within the year (includes price driven ToUT)

title: Peak utilisation (%) at Primary Substations
description: Peak half hourly demand (with ToUT) within the year as proportion of primary substation capacity

title: Electric Vehicles (DATA DIRECT FROM DATA PORTAL)
description: Number of registered plug in electric vehicles (pure and hybrid)
